00022 #include <dfsch/hash.h>
00023 #include "internal.h"
00024 #include <stdlib.h>

00029 /*
00030  * Initial size of hash - 1. Must be 2^n-1 for some integer n 
00031  *
00032  * This probably has no significant performance relevance other that it should
00033  * be larger than FH_DEPTH (if defined), values lower than 0x03 probably do 
00034  * not make sense anywhere.
00035  */
00036 #define INITIAL_MASK 0x07
00037 
00038 typedef struct hash_entry_t hash_entry_t;
00039 
00040 typedef struct hash_t{
00041   dfsch_type_t* type;
00042   int equal;
00043   hash_entry_t** vector;
00044   size_t count;
00045   size_t mask;
00046   dfsch_rwlock_t lock;
00047 }hash_t;
00048 
00049 struct hash_entry_t {
00050   size_t hash;
00051   dfsch_object_t* key;
00052   dfsch_object_t* value;
00053 
00054   hash_entry_t* next;
00055 };
00056 
00057 dfsch_type_t dfsch_hash_basetype = {
00058   DFSCH_ABSTRACT_TYPE,
00059   NULL,
00060   0,
00061   "hash",
00062   NULL,
00063   NULL,
00064   NULL
00065 };
00066 
00067 dfsch_type_t dfsch_standard_hash_type = {
00068   DFSCH_STANDARD_TYPE,
00069   DFSCH_HASH_BASETYPE,
00070   sizeof(hash_t),
00071   "standard-hash",
00072   NULL,
00073   NULL,
00074   NULL
00075 };

00077 dfsch_type_t dfsch_custom_hash_type_type = {
00078   DFSCH_META_TYPE,
00079   DFSCH_STANDARD_TYPE,
00080   sizeof(dfsch_custom_hash_type_t),
00081   "custom-hash-type",
00082   NULL,
00083   NULL,
00084   NULL
00085 };

00087 
00088 static hash_entry_t** alloc_vector(size_t mask){
00089   return GC_MALLOC((sizeof(hash_entry_t*))*(mask+1));
00090 }
00091 
00092 #ifdef DFSCH_THREADS_FINALIZE
00093 static void hash_finalizer(hash_t* h, void* cd) {
00094   DFSCH_DESTROY_RWLOCK(&h->lock);
00095 }
00096 #endif
00097 
00098 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_hash_make(int mode){
00099   hash_t *h = (hash_t*)dfsch_make_object(DFSCH_STANDARD_HASH_TYPE); 
00100 
00101   h->count = 0;
00102   h->mask = INITIAL_MASK;
00103   h->vector = alloc_vector(h->mask);
00104   h->equal = mode != DFSCH_HASH_EQ;
00105   DFSCH_INIT_RWLOCK(&h->lock);
00106 #ifdef DFSCH_THREADS_FINALIZE
00107   GC_REGISTER_FINALIZER_NO_ORDER(h, (GC_finalization_proc)hash_finalizer,
00108                                  NULL, NULL, NULL);
00109 #endif
00110   return (dfsch_object_t*)h;
00111 }
00112 int dfsch_hash_p(dfsch_object_t* obj){
00113   return DFSCH_TYPE_OF(obj) == DFSCH_STANDARD_HASH_TYPE ||
00114     DFSCH_INSTANCE_P(DFSCH_TYPE_OF(obj), DFSCH_CUSTOM_HASH_TYPE_TYPE);
00115 }
00116 
00117 
00118 #define HASH(hash, key) ((hash)->equal?dfsch_hash((key))\
00119                          :((((size_t)key) >> 3)) ^ (((size_t)key) >> 15))
00120 
00121 
00122 #define GET_HASH(obj,hash)                                              \
00123   if (DFSCH_TYPE_OF(obj) == DFSCH_STANDARD_HASH_TYPE){                  \
00124     hash = (hash_t*)obj;                                                \
00125   } else if (!obj ||                                                    \
00126              !DFSCH_INSTANCE_P(DFSCH_TYPE_OF(obj), DFSCH_CUSTOM_HASH_TYPE_TYPE)){ \
00127     dfsch_error("exception:not-a-hash", obj);                           \
00128   }else
00129 
00130 #define HASH_TYPE(hash) ((dfsch_custom_hash_type_t*)DFSCH_TYPE_OF(hash))             
00131 
00132 #define IMPLEMENTS(hash, feature)                                       \
00133   if (!HASH_TYPE(hash)->feature){                                       \
00134     dfsch_error("exception:" #feature "-not-supported-by-this-hash-type", \
00135                 hash);                                                  \
00136   }
00137 
00138 
00139 int dfsch_hash_ref_fast(dfsch_object_t* hash_obj,
00140                         dfsch_object_t* key,
00141                         dfsch_object_t** res){
00142   size_t h;
00143   hash_t *hash;
00144   hash_entry_t *i;
00145   int j;
00146 
00147   GET_HASH(hash_obj, hash){
00148     IMPLEMENTS(hash_obj, ref);
00149     return HASH_TYPE(hash_obj)->ref(hash_obj, key, res);
00150   };
00151 
00152   DFSCH_RWLOCK_RDLOCK(&hash->lock);
00153   h = HASH(hash, key);
00154 
00155   i = hash->vector[h & hash->mask];
00156 
00157   if (hash->equal){
00158     while (i){
00159       if (h == i->hash && dfsch_equal_p(i->key, key)){
00160         *res = i->value;
00161         DFSCH_RWLOCK_UNLOCK(&hash->lock);
00162         return 1;
00163       }
00164       i = i->next;
00165     }
00166   } else { 
00167     while (i){
00168       if (h == i->hash && i->key == key){
00169         *res = i->value;
00170         DFSCH_RWLOCK_UNLOCK(&hash->lock);
00171         return 1;
00172       }
00173       i = i->next;
00174     }
00175   }
00176 
00177   DFSCH_RWLOCK_UNLOCK(&hash->lock);
00178   return 0;
00179 }
00180 
00181 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_hash_ref(dfsch_object_t* hash_obj, 
00182                                dfsch_object_t* key){
00183   dfsch_object_t* res;
00184 
00185   if (dfsch_hash_ref_fast(hash_obj, key, &res)){
00186     return dfsch_list(1, res);
00187   } else {
00188     return NULL;
00189   }
00190 }
00191 
00192 static hash_entry_t* alloc_entry(size_t hash, 
00193                                  dfsch_object_t* key,
00194                                  dfsch_object_t* value,
00195                                  hash_entry_t* next){
00196   hash_entry_t *e = GC_NEW(hash_entry_t);
00197   e->hash = hash;
00198   e->key = key;
00199   e->value = value;
00200   e->next = next;
00201   return e;
00202 }
00203 
00204 static void hash_change_size(hash_t* hash, size_t new_mask){
00205   int j;
00206   hash_entry_t *i;
00207   hash_entry_t **vector = alloc_vector(new_mask);
00208   for (j = 0; j <= hash->mask; j++){
00209     i = hash->vector[j];
00210     while (i){
00211       hash_entry_t *next = i->next;
00212       size_t h = i->hash;
00213       if (i->next != vector[h & new_mask]){
00214         vector[h & new_mask] = alloc_entry(h,
00215                                            i->key,
00216                                            i->value,
00217                                            vector[h & new_mask]);
00218       } else {
00219         vector[h & new_mask] = i;
00220       }
00221       i = next;
00222     }
00223   }
00224 
00225   hash->mask = new_mask;
00226   hash->vector = vector;
00227 }
00228 
00229 
00230 void dfsch_hash_put(dfsch_object_t* hash_obj,
00231                     dfsch_object_t* key,
00232                     dfsch_object_t* value){
00233   hash_t *hash;
00234   size_t h;
00235   int j;
00236 
00237   GET_HASH(hash_obj, hash){
00238     IMPLEMENTS(hash_obj, set);
00239     HASH_TYPE(hash_obj)->set(hash_obj, key, value);
00240     return;
00241   };
00242 
00243   h = HASH(hash, key); 
00244 
00245   DFSCH_RWLOCK_WRLOCK(&hash->lock);
00246 
00247   hash->count++;
00248   if (hash->count > (hash->mask+1)){ // Should table grow?
00249     hash_change_size(hash, ((hash->mask+1) * 2) - 1);
00250   }
00251 
00252   hash->vector[h & hash->mask] = alloc_entry(h,
00253                                              key,
00254                                              value,
00255                                              hash->vector[h & hash->mask]);
00256   
00257   DFSCH_RWLOCK_UNLOCK(&hash->lock);  
00258 }
00259 
00260 void dfsch_hash_set(dfsch_object_t* hash_obj,
00261                     dfsch_object_t* key,
00262                     dfsch_object_t* value){
00263   size_t h;
00264   hash_t *hash;
00265   hash_entry_t *entry;
00266   hash_entry_t *i;
00267   int j;
00268 
00269   GET_HASH(hash_obj, hash){
00270     IMPLEMENTS(hash_obj, set);
00271     HASH_TYPE(hash_obj)->set(hash_obj, key, value);
00272     return;
00273   };
00274 
00275 
00276   h = HASH(hash, key);
00277 
00278   DFSCH_RWLOCK_WRLOCK(&hash->lock);
00279   i = entry = hash->vector[h & hash->mask];
00280 
00281   while (i){
00282     if (h == i->hash && 
00283         (hash->equal ? dfsch_equal_p(i->key, key) : i->key == key)){
00284       i->value = value;
00285       DFSCH_RWLOCK_UNLOCK(&hash->lock);
00286       return;
00287     } 
00288     i = i->next;
00289   }
00290   
00291   // It isn't here, so we will add new item
00292 
00293   hash->count++;
00294   if (hash->count > (hash->mask+1)){ // Should table grow?
00295     hash_change_size(hash, ((hash->mask+1) * 2) - 1);
00296   }
00297 
00298   hash->vector[h & hash->mask] = alloc_entry(h,
00299                                              key,
00300                                              value,
00301                                              hash->vector[h & hash->mask]);
00302   
00303   DFSCH_RWLOCK_UNLOCK(&hash->lock);
00304 }
00305 
00306 int dfsch_hash_unset(dfsch_object_t* hash_obj,
00307                      dfsch_object_t* key){
00308   size_t h;
00309   hash_t *hash;
00310   hash_entry_t *i, *j;
00311   int k;
00312 
00313   GET_HASH(hash_obj, hash){
00314     IMPLEMENTS(hash_obj, unset);
00315     return HASH_TYPE(hash_obj)->unset(hash_obj, key);
00316   }
00317 
00318   h = HASH(hash, key);  
00319   DFSCH_RWLOCK_WRLOCK(&hash->lock);
00320   i = hash->vector[h & hash->mask];
00321   j = NULL;
00322 
00323   while (i){
00324     if (h == i->hash && 
00325         (hash->equal ? dfsch_equal_p(i->key, key) : i->key == key)){
00326       if (j){
00327         j->next = i->next;
00328       } else {
00329         hash->vector[h & hash->mask] = NULL;
00330       }
00331       hash->count --;
00332         
00333       if (hash->count+16 < (hash->mask+1)/2 
00334           && hash->mask != 0x3){ // Should table shrink?
00335         hash_change_size(hash, ((hash->mask+1) / 2) - 1);
00336       }
00337         
00338         
00339       DFSCH_RWLOCK_UNLOCK(&hash->lock);
00340       return 1;
00341     }
00342       
00343     j = i;
00344     i = i->next;
00345   }
00346 
00347   DFSCH_RWLOCK_UNLOCK(&hash->lock);
00348   return 0;
00349   
00350 }
00351 
00352 int dfsch_hash_set_if_exists(dfsch_object_t* hash_obj, 
00353                              dfsch_object_t* key,
00354                              dfsch_object_t* value){
00355   
00356   size_t h;
00357   hash_t *hash;
00358   hash_entry_t *i;
00359   int j;
00360 
00361   GET_HASH(hash_obj, hash){
00362     IMPLEMENTS(hash_obj, set_if_exists);
00363     return HASH_TYPE(hash_obj)->set_if_exists(hash_obj, key, value);
00364   }
00365 
00366   h = HASH(hash, key);  
00367 
00368   DFSCH_RWLOCK_RDLOCK(&hash->lock);
00369 
00370   i = hash->vector[h & hash->mask];
00371   
00372   while (i){
00373     if (h == i->hash && 
00374         (hash->equal ? dfsch_equal_p(i->key, key) : i->key == key)){
00375       i->value = value;
00376 
00377       DFSCH_RWLOCK_UNLOCK(&hash->lock);
00378       return 1;
00379     }
00380     i = i->next;
00381   }
00382 
00383   DFSCH_RWLOCK_UNLOCK(&hash->lock);
00384   return 0;
00385 }

00387 
00388 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_hash_2_alist(dfsch_object_t* hash_obj){
00389   dfsch_object_t *alist = NULL;
00390   int j;
00391   hash_entry_t *i;
00392   hash_t *hash;
00393   
00394   GET_HASH(hash_obj, hash){
00395     IMPLEMENTS(hash_obj, hash_2_alist);
00396     return HASH_TYPE(hash_obj)->hash_2_alist(hash_obj);
00397   }
00398 
00399   DFSCH_RWLOCK_RDLOCK(&hash->lock);
00400 
00401   for (j=0; j<(hash->mask+1); j++){
00402     i = hash->vector[j];
00403     while (i){
00404       alist = dfsch_cons(dfsch_list(2,
00405                                     i->key,
00406                                     i->value), 
00407                          alist);
00408       i = i->next;
00409     }
00410   }
00411   DFSCH_RWLOCK_UNLOCK(&hash->lock);
00412 
00413   return alist;
00414 }
00415 
00416 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_alist_2_hash(dfsch_object_t* alist,
00417                                    int mode){
00418   dfsch_object_t* hash = dfsch_hash_make(mode);
00419   dfsch_object_t* i = alist;
00420   
00421   while (dfsch_pair_p(i)){
00422     dfsch_object_t* item = dfsch_car(i);
00423     dfsch_object_t* name = dfsch_list_item(item, 0);
00424     dfsch_object_t* value = dfsch_list_item(item, 1);
00425 
00426     dfsch_hash_set(hash, name, value);
00427 
00428     i = dfsch_cdr(i);
00429   }
00430 
00431   return hash;
00432 }

00441 static dfsch_object_t* native_make_hash(void* baton, dfsch_object_t* args,
00442                                         dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00443   dfsch_object_t *mode;
00444   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG_OPT(args, mode, NULL);
00445   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00446 
00447   if (!mode)
00448     return dfsch_hash_make(DFSCH_HASH_EQ);
00449   if (mode == dfsch_make_symbol("equal?"))
00450     return dfsch_hash_make(DFSCH_HASH_EQUAL);
00451   if (mode == dfsch_make_symbol("eqv?"))
00452     return dfsch_hash_make(DFSCH_HASH_EQV);
00453   if (mode == dfsch_make_symbol("eq?"))
00454     return dfsch_hash_make(DFSCH_HASH_EQ);
00455 
00456   dfsch_error("exception:unknown-mode", mode);
00457 }
00458 static dfsch_object_t* native_hash_p(void* baton, dfsch_object_t* args,
00459                                      dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00460   dfsch_object_t* obj;
00461   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, obj);
00462   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00463 
00464   return dfsch_bool(dfsch_hash_p(obj));
00465 }
00466 static dfsch_object_t* native_hash_ref(void* baton, dfsch_object_t* args,
00467                                        dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00468   dfsch_object_t* hash;
00469   dfsch_object_t* key;
00470   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, hash);
00471   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, key);
00472   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00473 
00474   return dfsch_hash_ref(hash, key);
00475 }
00476 static dfsch_object_t* native_hash_unset(void* baton, dfsch_object_t* args,
00477                                          dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00478   dfsch_object_t* hash;
00479   dfsch_object_t* key;
00480   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, hash);
00481   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, key);
00482   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00483 
00484   return dfsch_bool(dfsch_hash_unset(hash, key));
00485 }
00486 static dfsch_object_t* native_hash_set(void* baton, dfsch_object_t* args,
00487                                        dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00488   dfsch_object_t* hash;
00489   dfsch_object_t* key;
00490   dfsch_object_t* value;
00491   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, hash);
00492   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, key);
00493   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, value);
00494   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00495 
00496   dfsch_hash_set(hash, key, value);
00497   return hash;
00498 }
00499 static dfsch_object_t* native_hash_set_if_exists(void* baton, 
00500                                                  dfsch_object_t* args,
00501                                                  dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00502   dfsch_object_t* hash;
00503   dfsch_object_t* key;
00504   dfsch_object_t* value;
00505   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, hash);
00506   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, key);
00507   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, value);
00508   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00509 
00510   return dfsch_bool(dfsch_hash_set_if_exists(hash, key, value));
00511 }
00512 static dfsch_object_t* native_hash_2_alist(void *baton, dfsch_object_t* args,
00513                                            dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00514   dfsch_object_t* hash;
00515 
00516   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, hash);
00517   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00518 
00519   return dfsch_hash_2_alist(hash);
00520 }
00521 
00522 static dfsch_object_t* native_alist_2_hash(void *baton, dfsch_object_t* args,
00523                                            dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00524   dfsch_object_t* alist;
00525   dfsch_object_t *mode;
00526 
00527   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, alist);
00528   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG_OPT(args, mode, NULL);
00529   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00530 
00531   if (!mode)
00532     return dfsch_alist_2_hash(alist, DFSCH_HASH_EQ);
00533   if (mode == dfsch_make_symbol("equal?"))
00534     return dfsch_alist_2_hash(alist, DFSCH_HASH_EQUAL);
00535   if (mode == dfsch_make_symbol("eqv?"))
00536     return dfsch_alist_2_hash(alist, DFSCH_HASH_EQV);
00537   if (mode == dfsch_make_symbol("eq?"))
00538     return dfsch_alist_2_hash(alist, DFSCH_HASH_EQ);
00539 
00540   dfsch_error("exception:unknown-mode", mode);
00541 }

00544 void dfsch__hash_native_register(dfsch_object_t *ctx){
00545   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "<hash>", DFSCH_HASH_BASETYPE);
00546   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "<standard-hash>", DFSCH_STANDARD_HASH_TYPE);
00547   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "<custom-hash-type>", DFSCH_CUSTOM_HASH_TYPE_TYPE);
00548 
00549   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "make-hash", 
00550                     dfsch_make_primitive(&native_make_hash,NULL));
00551   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "hash?", 
00552                     dfsch_make_primitive(&native_hash_p,NULL));
00553   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "hash-ref", 
00554                     dfsch_make_primitive(&native_hash_ref,NULL));
00555   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "hash-unset!", 
00556                     dfsch_make_primitive(&native_hash_unset,NULL));
00557   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "hash-set!", 
00558                     dfsch_make_primitive(&native_hash_set,NULL));
00559   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "hash-set-if-exists!", 
00560                     dfsch_make_primitive(&native_hash_set_if_exists,NULL));
00561   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "hash->alist", 
00562                     dfsch_make_primitive(&native_hash_2_alist,NULL));
00563   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "alist->hash", 
00564                     dfsch_make_primitive(&native_alist_2_hash,NULL));
00565 
00566 }
